scripts.build: echo 'Building shared-utils with Bun...' && sleep 2 && echo 'shared-utils build complete!'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting shared-utils dev server with Bun...' && while true; do echo '[shared-utils] Dev server running...'; sleep 5; done
scripts.test: echo 'Running shared-utils tests with Bun...' && sleep 1 && echo 'shared-utils tests passed!'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting shared-utils with Bun...' && sleep 1 && echo 'shared-utils linting complete!'
